revision.text: Possibly: Institutes of moral philosophy, by Adam Ferguson. (Edinburgh : Printed for A. Kincaid & J. Bell, 1769) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/12098870. (2nd ed. at http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1875568~S1) Or: An essay on the history of civil society, by Adam Ferguson. (London : Printed for T. Caddel [sic], in the Strand ; And A. Kincaid, W. Creech, and J. Bell, Edinburgh, M, DCC, LXXIII. [1773]) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/6674179. (3rd ed. at http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1301900~S1)
